name: Mysterious Murder Train
description:
STORY : The story revolves around an incident with a colleague on a special express train coming to Istanbul. followed by cumulative aircool Husband Rot who gathered to come here Ask everyone to answer questions from the prosecutor investigating the case. Events before the limited express train arrives at the destination Which will be the recipient of 1 in 13 cases who join the group in this event Comply with martial law and reasons for accidents CONTROLLER :
  • A : MOVE TO LEFT
  • D : MOVE TO RIGHT
  • E : TALK
  • LEFT CLICK : EXPLORE
TEAM MEMBER :
  • 630117010029 : Kongpop Clevong ( research , translater )
  • 630117010032 : Thatphong Naembua ( programmer )
  • 630117010033 : Jaturong Panthong ( character designer , programmer support)
  • 630117010037 : Teenathorn Boonduang ( level designer)
  • 630117010041 : Katanyuta Buawiset ( writer , support , story board )
  • 630117010043 : Benjawan Prasit ( ui designer , support  )
